entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
